website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality slackline that will please newbies and experienced slackliners.
pros: This durable slackline comes in 50- or 85-foot lengths, making it a versatile option
The longer line can easily be shortened, which allows for more setup options
Customers love the molded plastic grip on the ratchet and the carrying case
cons: A few customers received kits that were missing parts

customer_reviews.title: The ratchet is a real let-down.
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the line, but the ratchet is too small to achieve adequate tension and it's narrow design seems to damage the line on release. My solution was to cut the loop end off the line and run a Gibbon ratchet on that side. On setup I tension both the SI and Gibbon ratchets but I always release on the Gibbon ratchet because it doesn't seem to cause any damage. With this setup we are having a good time. I think the kit needs work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Tree wraps weren't huge, but were enough to cover the trees I used. For a non-primitive setup, it's a great starter pack to get you into the sport. I haven't taken it out a ton of times, but when I have it was super simple to rig and get walking on. I love it, and can't wait to use it more once it gets nice out again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a slack line on a whim and I love it!! I've gotten to enjoy it with my friends and family on multiple occasions. this makes a great gift for young people to go out and get active. If I was gifted this i would truly enjoy it. I am not much of a professional so I cannot review the over all quality compared to more professional slack lines, but as a beginner this truly does get the job done. It is long and easy to install, so its actually really easy to find a pair of trees to hand it from.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: only used once
customer_reviews.text: 1st slack line & only used once, so take my review with a grain of salt. The DVD was a great help. Make sure you pay attention to the "taco fold" part. Select a moderate sized tree for the short end (about two feet diameter). Any bigger & 1) you won't be able to get the line around it & 2) you won't be able to taco fold. I was fortunate enough to run into someone that had been doing this for several years. Basic advice is concentrate on just standing still before you try walking. Also, consider this as a form of exercise (including yoga) & learn "poses" to build balance.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.  Shorter one probably better.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. I think the longer lines like this one are more difficult than the shorter ones. We hooked it up between two trees that were about 56 ft apart and it was nearly impossible to get it right enough. Then we tried it with two trees that were more lIke 35 ft and it was much more taught and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but too much review mongering by the seller
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but the aggressive review mongering by the seller is really a buzz kill. Tone it down please! If I'm happy with the product I will leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: user user

customer_reviews.title: Great slack line
customer_reviews.text: We do like it. However, you do not need to buy the 85 foot one. It is too long. You don't want to use between trees that are that far apart, the line is far too wobbly under that scenario. Save the few bucks and just get the 50 foot one. I wouldn't buy the training line either. You'll use it for such a short period of time...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Rettig

customer_reviews.title: Flipping easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted this item for quite a while. He finally made the jump to purchase it and is thrilled. We had a bit of a set back when UPS delivered it to the neighbor's address, but that was easily rectified. Since then, he has set it up in the back yar, a friend's house, and a local park. With the amount of times he has put it up and taken it own, it seems like it is easy to do. He attaches the ens and just cranks it until he gets the tension he wants. He's been balancing on it and can even do a flip dismount. It arrive on time and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sunspot

customer_reviews.title: Works just like a slackline is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a slackline is supposed to. The material is heavy duty and the setup is a snap. This works almost identical to a come-along ratcheting tie down except no hooks. You wrap the ends around a tree or firmly mounted pole, feed the loose end through the ratcheting mechanism, pull it hand tight and then engage the ratcheting mechanism to get it tight enough to walk on. You have to make sure your pole is firmly anchored in the ground or the slack line will pull it off center when you tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great slackline, no issues
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about buying a non-name-brand slackline, since everyone I know uses Gibbons. This line has been great and I have zero complaints about it. Would absolutely buy again. Before you buy it, I would consider how long a line you want. Longer does give you more options, but it is cumbersome to set up for shorter stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: The end with the ratchet doesn't go around the tree, so basically we haven't used it much. bummer. They should specify that the end tree has to be small cause the loop is only so big. The other tree size really doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Galan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a 50' ft for easier set up unless you ...
customer_reviews.text: have only needed the full length once. I recommend a 50' ft for easier set up unless you know you will need the full 85' ft
customer_reviews.author: JamesPeters

customer_reviews.title: good for a challenge.
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I have another slackline (49 feet). the challenge to this one is the length - it's much harder as it's longer. If you have the space, it's a quality line & a good challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Boston suburban dweller

customer_reviews.title: Nice package
customer_reviews.text: So far this slackline is great. It was easy to set up and I really like that the tree protection is included. The ratchet is very ergonomic and the plastic on the handle makes it very comfortable to use. The directions are clear and easy to follow. Overall I'm very satisfied with my purchase. Hopefully it is durable and I can play on it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome kit that helps you learn and up your slack line skill. I use it regularly. Set up is easy. And, everything works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: LAG

customer_reviews.title: Great fun. Add a little liquid balancing fluid & ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. Add a little liquid balancing fluid & the fun increases. The 80' line is looooong. I can't help myself & ordered it thinking it would be useful. The larger the gap, the harder it gets. So, someday Ill be able to go the full distance.
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Our three kids ages 10, 15 and 19 love this. 50 feet is really far. I had no idea. Luckily it can be really shortened. I just went online and watched the manufacturer video tutorial to set it up. We bought a $10 rope from Home Depot for the 10 year old and her friends to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this for Christmas. I was scared it might be hard to put it up by myself but the kids and I watched to DVD and we didn't have any trouble. We had to buy this longer one because the trees we were using were farther apart. If you are able to get the shorter one I would recommend it. But we had a lot of laughs and a lot of fun so far! I do wish this one came with the help line but none of the longer slacklines I found came with the helpline
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun and Exercise
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter. She loves it and is excited to use it. Unfortunately, our trees in our yard are too big around for her to set it up here at home, however there are parks in the area where others meet to enjoy slack lining.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and it's great quality. Its great for first timers the only ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend. He loves it and it's great quality. Its great for first timers the only thing is the ratchet got caught on the rope and snagged it which is why I'm giving it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jenessa Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fun way to work on balance and body control!
customer_reviews.author: yarz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to understand instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to understand instructions. Kids LOVE it!!! Ordered another as a gift for older son. He loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great setup to get started! Got the long version as you can always make it shorter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter. Just what she wanted. It seems to be exactly as represented. Easy to set up and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Anne

customer_reviews.title: The item looks good, we have not set it up yet as ...
customer_reviews.text: The item looks good, we have not set it up yet as it has been very cold and snowy, can't wait though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really cool and a great way to get started slackslining!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a whole load of fun and very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a whole load of fun and very easy to set up. Don't expect to be able to walk up and down the line day one. It's tougher than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: Only slightly negative comment that I have is that the tree protectors could be a little bit more generous in size. Other than that, I love the product. Great to have around. It took me about 100 tries (2 hours) before I could walk between two trees, 30 feet apart. Now I can juggle, ride a unicyle, AND walk a slackline, one cool uncle skill at a time, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great family activity!!!  Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: What fun! Such a great activity for kids and adults alike! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but the set has no ratchet protection and no guide line. Not for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Main line is 77 feet. Ratchet end is 8 feet
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a mesh carry bag with handles and the tree protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Emely R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The tree wraps were too short for my trees but I knew that as it was part of the description.
customer_reviews.author: Tate M. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. It has improved my balance while climbing. I started as a beginner on it but I am not bored of it after a year still.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality-have had this for a couple of months now and very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Joel R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came very next day and Great quality!! I love my slackline!
customer_reviews.author: heaven

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fun family activity
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun family activity. All ages can be challenged. Gets the kids and parents outside and off their phones. Easy set up and great training video. Really works the CORE muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! So much fun, pretty easy and quick to set up, and really sturdy. My only complaint would be that the blue tree protectors are fairly small, and do not fit around any of the trees that I have hooked the slack line up to. I wish they were bigger because I can see how the bark on trees can damage the slack line after a while with no protection. Otherwise, it's a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Xenakis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had it over a year and use it often.
customer_reviews.author: D. Delave

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great company! Although I would recommend getting a shorter slackline 80ft is too long for me. I would definitely recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Radcliff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality line for anyone. I was extremely happy with my item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE slacklining. It's an interesting challenge. The quality of this line is great - the ratchet isn't cheaply made and the line itself is durable. I do find that the loop of the ratchet and the looped part of the line are wearing more so than anything, but I think that's naturally due to the strain. The instruction video helps if you're a beginner - we used it to learn how to set up, especially. Overall, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN times!!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!! not sure if i missed this but I suppose it should be obvious. But the webbing does stretch to the point of having to re-ratchet now and again. This makes me thing the life of this product may not be very long. But loving it all the same!
customer_reviews.author: J Michael

customer_reviews.title: great beginner slackline
customer_reviews.text: great beginner slackline. I've taken mine across the US with me and used it many differenct places. It's durable, fun, and challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting two lines. One upper line for ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting two lines. One upper line for holding on and one bottom line to walk and balance on. I guess that was my mistake. thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MISSING TREE PROTECTION IN KIT!
customer_reviews.text: Package came with the CD and slackline but the kit was missing the Tree protection which should be included. What's going on here?!
customer_reviews.author: Richie P.

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: defective However, It made a small "pop" noise as the webbing elongated once the person hopped on.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: These do not work as advertised. They are difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: These do not work as advertised. They are difficult to fill up with out wind and they don't hold air well once filled.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Long line.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really, really, really long slackline. Didn't think about how long it was when I bought it, but it is slightly difficult and a little more time to set up because of the sheer length of the line. Other than that, it is a wonderful and high quality slackline. If you are going to be putting this line up where you need a long length, even better! It still works with short distances.
customer_reviews.author: Lazerfox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it,,,every house has to have One. Thank You,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's absolutely perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before I bought my first slackline, all reviews brought me to this ite. it's absolutely perfect for what I need, I'm pretty new to slacklining so I only wish that I had gone with a shorter line and not been so overzealous. :P
customer_reviews.author: matt gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great line, missing DVD (see below)
customer_reviews.text: This line is easy to set up and functions very well as a stable beginner line. When it arrived, I was initially disappointed when I opened the box to find the DVD missing, but this turned out to not be an issue as all the content is on Slackline Industries' YouTube channel. Everything in the kit works as intended, and I am very happy with my purchase. The 85 foot line is very long, which was what I was wanting, but for most people I would recommend the 50 foot line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.text: As described. All pictured items were included. Very easy to setup, though some of the black-and-white images in the directions were a little tricky to decipher. Much longer webbing than I needed today, my first time using it, which is perfect as I hope to be using more and more as I improve. Comfortable webbing on my bare feet. Very attractive, high quality materials (it seems, so far. again, 1 day of use). Ratchet was very easy to use for setup, and releasing for take down. My experience was of a good quality, reliable product. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Components
customer_reviews.text: I ordered with the next day shipping method. It came but it is missing two parts that it advertises. It is missing the instructional DVD AND the black bag to store it. I'm sure the product works fine, I just have a pet peeve of not receiving everything i order.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Percey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can spand 85ft but can not walk it... need wayyyyy more practice... LoL
customer_reviews.author: Phill gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: it works all the same and it is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time its addicting and the product holds up very well on multiple different surfaces, it works all the same and it is very easy to use. Holds weight really well and helps so much with improving and advancing skills for beginners and intermediates.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great product, im brand new to this and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, im brand new to this and now I'm walking across after a few hours of practice. You'll get a decent workout and you'll amaze yourself if you just stick with it .
customer_reviews.author: logan tate

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit. My daughter and I have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Kit. My daughter and I have been using this for over a month and are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was for a gift and it was what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 50m and it might be too long but I am completely satisfied with the purchase. It is easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Daina

customer_reviews.title: Great product - we have a large backyard and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product - we have a large backyard and we wish they sold the help line in 85 feet length to go along with this product. It was easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Shook

customer_reviews.title: Get the guide line (or whatever the overhead line is called) for those under 12 or even older. It will get used much more.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult for grandson to use, so bought the guide line and now they are having a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids are crazy about this slack line. Very helpful to watch tutorial for first time set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Murphy

customer_reviews.title: definitely a great intro line
customer_reviews.text: Did a bit of research before purchasing. definitely a great intro line!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Having a blast with this but way harder than it looks
customer_reviews.author: Lary Van Scoy

customer_reviews.title: Def a cool set up
customer_reviews.text: Slacklines are sick! Def a cool set up. Little noisy though. Primative setup is slightly better. Enjoy both though!! This is a good buy. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Chase E. Mikel

customer_reviews.title: My children and I are having so much fun. And it's yet another avenue for our family ...
customer_reviews.text: My children and I are having so much fun. And it's yet another avenue for our family to connect with each other and with nature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great package for anyone who is interested in learning Slackline.
customer_reviews.author: Johnhenry Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and is great length for setting up between trees in my yard. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was requested and fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.author: Karen

product_meta.title: Slackline Industries Baseline Slackline Complete Kit With Tree Protection
product_meta.description: Turn any environment into a playground with this slackline designed as a complete kit for beginners who are looking to improve their skills. Slacklining is the perfect way to improve balancing abilities and core strength. If you are a beginner or intermediate slacker with the potential and desire to take it up a notch, the Slackline Industries Baseline is for you! Slacklining is a great activity that requires little investment and gets kids and families outside. Slacklining is a great physical activity that promotes hand and eye coordination, balance, and creativity. Great for use as a yoga slackline. Average time from opening the box to kids on the line is under 10 minutes which makes this convenient and easy to take just about anywhere.
feature_bullets: Soft plastic handle grip for comfortable and efficient tensioning
Easy-to-use ratchet with 8 feet of webbing and reinforced loop to firmly anchor and tension the slackline
